author: sebb
msg: Split multi-threaded tests into separate test cases
Move init of isRun from run() to ctor so main thread can reset it even if run() method is delayed
Increase maxWait for test with holdTime = 1 to allow for JVMs that may sleep() for much longer than requested.
Wait for threads to complete in multipleThreads() method
- all threads must be able to set the status variable
- status variable needs to be correctly published
